add_coti.title: Add COTI Network to MetaMask

step1.title: Step 1: Open MetaMask
step1.text: Click the network dropdown at the top left of MetaMask and select 'Add a custom network'.

step2.title: Step 2: Enter COTI Mainnet Info
step2.text:
Fill in the fields with:

Network Name: COTI
RPC URL: https://mainnet.coti.io/rpc
Chain ID: 2632500
Symbol: COTI
Block Explorer: https://mainnet.cotiscan.io

step3.title: Step 3: Save & Switch
step3.text: Click 'Save'. MetaMask will switch to the COTI network automatically.

step4.title: You're All Set!
step4.text: You’ve added the COTI network to MetaMask. You can now bridge tokens or interact with dApps on COTI V2.

add_coti.note_intro: This website is 100% open-source and created for the COTI community to share technical instructions.
add_coti.note_1_part1: All source code is available publicly on
add_coti.note_2: • The site loads directly from GitHub Pages — no hidden code or injected content.
add_coti.note_3: • No wallet connection is required to view or use this site.
add_coti.note_4: • We understand crypto users are cautious. Please feel free to inspect the code before clicking any links.
add_coti.note_closing: ✅ Stay safe, stay informed, and explore the COTI ecosystem with confidence.
